transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Hello.
Customer: Hello, Naveen ji se baat ho rahi hai.
Executive: Hello. Hello, Naveen ji se baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji bataiye Naveen ji.
Executive: Main Pawan baat kar raha tha IndiaMART se sir. Aapki na ek concern chal raha tha na regarding refund ke liye. To wo already proceed ho gaya hai hamari taraf se sir. Aur aapne jo last time payment ki thi wo aapne kaise pay kiya tha sir? UPI ke through tha na sir? To jis jis bank se aapne UPI ke through payment kiya hua tha us pe aapko na sir 10 din mein amount aapko 36001 aapka refund hoga sir. Aur us pe jaise hi refund aa jata hai ek bar aap inform kar dijiyega jo aapke account manager hai na Manish ji unka number diya hoga whatsapp pe to wo bhi hai. Hamari taraf se ho gaya sir ek bar aap check bhi kar sakte hain aapka koi bhi expiry aap consume karenge to nahi hoga wo yahan se proceed ho gaya sir hamari taraf se.
Customer: To ye aapne mere ko mail kar diya hai?
Executive: Aapne kya ye cheeze mere ko mail ki hai?
Customer: Haan sir aapko sir aapki registered email id pe milega. Main aapko amount bata raha hun. Haan haan. Ek bar check kar lijiye sir please.
Customer: Kya cheez?
Executive: Ek bar check kar lijiye aaya hai kya koi message? Aapne mail bheja hai ki kya kiya hai?
Executive: Sir hamari taraf se abhi notify hua na 5 baje aapko bataya gaya tha ki hum aapko inform karenge. Pehle to aapki disable ho gayi hai company aapki mail bheja hai ya message kuch mere ko return mein aap isme kya sir main inform kar raha hun. Main inform kar raha hun aapko ki hamari taraf se update aa gaya jaise hi update aaya maine aapko call karke over recording call hi aapko main bataya aur abhi aapko na main mail bhi kar de raha hun theek hai sir jispe amount jis jis haan main aapko us pe it will be taking approximately seven to 10 days to reflect usse pehle hi ho jata hai sir kyuki abhi working day aisa kuch bhi nahi ki holiday hai working days rehta hai to wo bhi main aapko update kar de raha hun theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Thank you.
Customer: Theek hai. Aur ye sir aapka ho gaya hai agar aap check karna chahte hain to abhi ek bar mobile application open karke aap koi bhi expiry consume karenge to it will be applicable for the month dekh lijiye sir disable ho gayi hai company aapki. Haan sir. Theek hai main dekh leta hun. Haan ek bar check bhi kar lijiye theek hai sir Naveen ji aapko main mail bhejne ke baad again I am just connecting you okay aur fir main closer lunga is complaint ka theek hai iske baad aap se baat karta hun theek hai main bas abhi jaise hi update aaya sabse pehle maine aap hi ko call kiya kyuki aapki taraf se sir subah bhi shayad call aaya tha Manish ji ke paas to maine usi call kiya theek hai abhi main mail kar raha hun mail kar theek hai aap isko mail karwa dijiye.
Executive: Haan main abhi karwa raha hun karwa raha hun theek hai okay okay sir thank you sir.
Customer: Thank you.
Executive: Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer enquired about the refund status.

- Customer asked if he would receive a mail.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed refund was processed.

- Executive informed about the refund amount.

- Executive confirmed the customer will receive a mail.

- Executive asked to check mobile application for disablement.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, upi, mail, disablement, application
